help_desc: Have any problem using the App or want to ask something, we are here to help you!
username_notice: (Notice: You can set username one time only)
game_played: You cannot play this game anymore. You have already played.
exit_desc: The current progress of game will be lost
slide2_desc: Check the game timings on the home page and wait for the game to begin.
slide3_desc: The fastest one to complete the Game wins. The Game will stop for everyone when there is a winner.
slide4_desc: A message will be sent to the Winner to receive rewards through Eaisy Paisa, Jazz Cash or Direct Deposit in Bank Account. Prizes will be delivered to address provided.
slide5_desc: Cash Amounts and Prizes will become BIGGER and BIGGER as our community grows.
you_win: You are in top 10 positions for this game
game_loose: Your are out of chances. BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME!
click_chat_icon: Click below icon to Chat with Us
no_winners: No Game has been played Today
no_score: you have not win any game yet
pick_odd_one: (Click the picture that is not a pair)
continue_playing: Do you want to continue playing game?
privacy_policy_p1: built the WinDiggy app as a Commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by and is intended for use as is.
privacy_policy_p2: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
privacy_policy_p3: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_p4: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at WinDiggy unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_p5: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.
privacy_policy_p6: The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacy_policy_p7: Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
privacy_policy_p8: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacy_policy_p9: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
privacy_policy_p10: This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacy_polocy_p11: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacy_policy_p13: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacy_policy_p15: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
privacy_policy_p16: We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacy_policy_p17: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_policy_p18: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy_policy_p19: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
privacy_policy_p20: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
privacy_policy_p21: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at info@windiggy.com.

terms_p85: Game timings are shown on the Home page. Before the game begins, a push notification will be sent to the user. A timer will be shown on their screens in a pop up. Once countdown timer is zero the play button will be enabled and users can play the game. Timer will be synced from our server using NTP and time across all the devices will be same. Different games have different tasks and different chances of winning. Prize will be distributed in top 10 winners of the game. The game will end when top 10 positions have been taken. Screenshots of the winners will be recorded and uploaded to the winners gallery list on the app drawer. To better the user experience games are stored in the app. The prize for this specific game will be given to the first person who finish the game. Once winner is announced our representative will contact the winner. The prize money or gift card or any other prize is sent through a third party service provider and proof of payment/delivery is kept in our records. Each game will have points for top 10 players. Based on our point system first position will get 10 points, second position will get 9 points, third position will get 8 points, fourth position will get 7 points, fifth position will get 6 points, sixth position will get 5 points, seventh position will get 4 points, eight position will get 3 points, nine position will get 2 points and tenth position will get 1 point. Bonus game will have different point system which will be described before the game.
terms_p86: WinDiggy keeps right to disqualify any user before, during or after the game if any one violates the rules of the game. The decision made WinDiggy will be final and cannot be challenged. No prize will be given if the game is canceled or disqualified. There is no compensation given to play the game. Only the winning user is given a prize. There are no in app purchases and it is a completely FREE App.
terms_p87: The mobile application flow is as follows:
terms_p88: 1. Login to App using Firebase Authentication with Phone number.
terms_p89: 2. After logging to App the user is taken to the Home Screen showing information about scheduled games.
terms_p90: 3. Firebase Real-time Database is integrated in the App to receive all that information.
terms_p91: 4. Before the start of game user receive push notification from Firebase notifying user that game is going to start.
terms_p92: 5. App is using NTP to show synchronized time across all the devices for the game.
terms_p93: 6. Firebase Real-time Database is integrated in the App to make synchronized data communication across all connected devices.
terms_p94: 7. At the end of game the App is captures the screenshot of winner and passes it to server to save the details.
terms_p95: 8. App is using Internet permission to make connection possible between client and server.
terms_p96: The laws of the Country, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Terms and Your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws.

terms_p109: Daily contest and challenge games will be available throughout the day in specific time slots. Daily contest and challenge game prize will be shared between top three users First will get 50%, second will get 30% and third will get 20%. There will be only points for the top three position holders in daily contest and challenge games as follows.
daily_contest_text: Daily contest game will start at 10:30 am and will end at 10:30 pm. The person with the lowest time or the highest score will be declared the winner. There will be only one winner.
block_chat: Sorry your account has been blocked for public chat.
block_game: Sorry your account has been blocked.
age_limit: By clicking on the box I agree that i am at least 13 years or older. I also agree to the
terms_p110: WinDiggy welcomes everyone over the age of THIRTEEN for respectful and considerate conversation.
terms_p111: THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF RULES WHICH HAVE BEEN PROVEN TO HELP CREATE THE SAFEST ENVIRONMENT POSSIBLE FOR OUR MEMBERS. THESE RULES MUST ALWAYS BE ADHERED TO BY ALL MEMBERS. THE MOMENT YOU CONNECT TO THE CHAT ROOM, YOU ARE AGREEING TO FOLLOW EACH AND EVERY GUIDELINE LISTED BELOW:
terms_p112: This Chat Room is run by a WinDiggy which reserves the right to censor, remove and ban any individuals that do not uphold all rules and regulations that have been agreed upon and listed. Any individual that is seen partaking in any of the following content during conversation may be banned from the WinDiggy app. For example we discourage:
terms_p118: The list above is not exhaustive, but demonstrative.
terms_p119: ANY THREAT, DIRECT OR INDIRECT TO ITS OWNERS OR VOLUNTEERS, WILL RESULT IN AN IMMEDIATE AND PERMANENT BAN. WE WELCOME ALL REASONABLE AND MATURE SUGGESTIONS OR REQUESTS, BUT WE WILL NOT TOLERATE THREATS OR ABUSIVE LAUNGUAGE.
terms_p121: We urge you not to share any personal information and are not responsible for any type of harm caused due to sharing things such as, personal e-mail, telephone number and street address. Although most people in the Chat Room are here for help and support, there may be untrustworthy people out there who may not have the best intentions. Please proceed with caution.
terms_p123: Foul language. Please refrain from using swear words, even in a disguised form. Less offensive curse words will be tolerated, but with discretion and only when deemed necessary by the moderators. Failing to adhere to this rule will result in a kick and possibly a ban.
terms_p124: Flooding and Spamming will not be tolerated. Continued flooding and spamming can result in a permanent ban.
terms_p125: Unsolicited invitations to any other website or app are also prohibited and will result in a permanent ban.
terms_p126: Any action that results in the disruption of this Chat Room will be handled immediately and without leniency. You will be permanently banned. Disruptions include hateful and intentional actions which hinder the safety of other users, verbal abuse, spamming/flooding, any breaking of the above listed banned content, hostility, and not following the moderators (Operators/Ops) instructions.
terms_p127: WinDiggy encourages the use of creative and expressive nicknames, and only asks that they are not offensive or hateful, and that you continue to use the same nickname each time you visit. Changing nicknames prevents friendship and trust from occurring. Please refrain from using foul language as part of your nickname.
terms_p128: Links to any other site for the purpose of advertising as opposed to helpful information will not be tolerated. It will result in a kick and possible ban from the entire network..
terms_p129: Harassment and abuse of WinDiggy users will not be tolerated. Harassing or abusing anyone, including users, moderators, or any other staff will result in immediate action. Actions taken will include, kicking, banning or permanent expulsion from the app..
terms_p131: WinDiggy takes no responsibility whatsoever for opinions expressed or actions taken by users. All sections of this App are used by you (as the user), at your own risk and without liability to us (the provider), in any shape or form. Moreover WinDiggy reserves the right to ban or remove any individual or individuals at will for any reason and at our discretion.
terms_p132: These Terms of Service can and will be changed at will without notice.
caught_cheating: You entered before time. Sorry you cannot play this game any more.
